name: Code Injection
description: Detects server-side code injection vulnerabilities where user input is evaluated as code by the application runtime (PHP eval, Python exec, Ruby eval, etc.)
author: Dominator Team
cwe_name: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
remediation: Never use eval() or similar functions with user input. Use safe alternatives like parameterized functions. Implement strict input validation with allowlists. Use sandboxed environments for code execution if absolutely necessary.
